passives.name: The Path Between
passives.effects:
If you have at least {{as|130 '''bonus''' attack damage}} and {{as|180 ability power}}, enter either the ''Material World'' or the ''Spirit World'', determined randomly, at the start of the combat phase in each round:

• '''Material World''': Increase your {{as|attack damage}} by 25% and gain {{as|{{pp|50 to 150|key=%}} '''bonus''' attack speed}}.
• '''Spirit World''': Increase your {{as|ability power}} by 25% and gain {{as|{{pp|30 to 120}} ability haste}}.
